GameConditionDef.label: heavy storm
GameConditionDef.description: An extreme storm is heading over the area. This will cause storm surges and floods in coastal areas.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The worst of the storm is over.

GameConditionDef.label: drought
GameConditionDef.description: Rain is absent, terrain dries out. A drought is happening in the region.

GameConditionDef.label: monsoon
GameConditionDef.description: A monsoon is going over the region. The strong rain will soak the terrain, valleys will flood and small creeks turn into rapid streams.
